SELECT SI_HAIJOU_ID ,
HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
HAISHIN_DATE ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM SI_HAIJOU
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY HAISHIN_DATE DESC

SELECT SI_HAIJOU_ID ,
HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
HAISHIN_DATE ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM SI_HAIJOU
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND HAISHIN_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID
ORDER BY HAISHIN_DATE DESC

SELECT SI_HAIJOU_ID ,
HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
HAISHIN_DATE ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM ( SELECT * FROM SI_HAIJOU
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY HAISHIN_DATE DESC ) as SI_HAIJOU_NOTDEL
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

INSERT INTO SI_HAIJOU( SI_HAIJOU_ID ,
HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
HAISHIN_DATE ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_HAIJOU_ID ,
:HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
:HAISHIN_DATE ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_HAIJOU SET HAISHIN_USER_ID = :HAISHIN_USER_ID ,
HAISHIN_DATE = :HAISHIN_DATE ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_HAIJOU_ID = :SI_HAIJOU_ID AND TS = :TS
